member.name: M:BusinessTier.Business.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of the business tier. The format of the filename should be either |DataDirectory|\filename.mdf, or a complete Windows pathname.

member.name: M:BusinessTier.Business.TestConnection

member.returns: true if successful, false if not

member.name: M:BusinessTier.Business.GetStations

member.name: M:BusinessTier.Business.GetStops(System.Int32)
